title: 旧约 - 诗篇(Psalms) - 第 45 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 诗篇(Psalms) -- 第 45 章 ( 本篇共有 150 章 )

lineList.en: My heart is inditing a good matter: I speak of the things which I have made touching the king: my tongue is the pen of a ready writer.
lineList.cn: （可拉后裔的训诲诗，又是爱慕歌，交与伶长，调用百合花）。我心里涌出美辞。我论到我为王作的事。我的舌头是快手笔。

lineList.en: Thou art fairer than the children of men: grace is poured into thy lips: therefore God hath blessed thee for ever.
lineList.cn: 你比世人更美，在你嘴里满有恩惠。所以神赐福给你，直到永远。

lineList.en: Gird thy sword upon thy thigh, O most mighty, with thy glory and thy majesty.
lineList.cn: 大能者阿，愿你腰间佩刀，大有荣耀和威严。

lineList.en: And in thy majesty ride prosperously because of truth and meekness and righteousness; and thy right hand shall teach thee terrible things.
lineList.cn: 为真理，谦卑，公义，赫然坐车前往，无不得胜。你的右手必显明可畏的事。

lineList.en: Thine arrows are sharp in the heart of the king's enemies; whereby the people fall under thee.
lineList.cn: 你的箭锋快，射中王敌之心。万民仆倒在你以下。

lineList.en: Thy throne, O God, is for ever and ever: the sceptre of thy kingdom is a right sceptre.
lineList.cn: 神阿，你的宝座是永永远远的，你的国权是正直的。

lineList.en: Thou lovest righteousness, and hatest wickedness: therefore God, thy God, hath anointed thee with the oil of gladness above thy fellows.
lineList.cn: 你喜爱公义，恨恶罪恶。所以神，就是你的神，用喜乐油膏你，胜过膏你的同伴。

lineList.en: All thy garments smell of myrrh, and aloes, and cassia, out of the ivory palaces, whereby they have made thee glad.
lineList.cn: 你的衣服，都有没药沉香肉桂的香气。象牙宫中有丝弦乐器的声音，使你欢喜。

lineList.en: Kings' daughters were among thy honourable women: upon thy right hand did stand the queen in gold of Ophir.
lineList.cn: 有君王的女儿，在你尊贵妇女之中。王后佩戴俄斐金饰，站在你右边。

lineList.en: Hearken, O daughter, and consider, and incline thine ear; forget also thine own people, and thy father's house;
lineList.cn: 女子阿，你要听，要想，要侧耳而听。不要记念你的民，和你的父家。

lineList.en: So shall the king greatly desire thy beauty: for he is thy Lord; and worship thou him.
lineList.cn: 王就羡慕你的美貌。因为他是你的主。你当敬拜他。

lineList.en: And the daughter of Tyre shall be there with a gift; even the rich among the people shall intreat thy favour.
lineList.cn: 推罗的民，（民原文作女子），必来送礼。民中富足人，也必向你求恩。

lineList.en: The king's daughter is all glorious within: her clothing is of wrought gold.
lineList.cn: 王女在宫里，极其荣华。他的衣服是用金线绣的。

lineList.en: She shall be brought unto the king in raiment of needlework: the virgins her companions that follow her shall be brought unto thee.
lineList.cn: 他要穿锦绣的衣服，被引到王前。随从他的陪伴童女，也要被带到你面前。

lineList.en: With gladness and rejoicing shall they be brought: they shall enter into the king's palace.
lineList.cn: 他们要欢喜快乐被引导。他们要进入王宫。

lineList.en: Instead of thy fathers shall be thy children, whom thou mayest make princes in all the earth.
lineList.cn: 你的子孙要接续你的列祖。你要立他们在全地作王。

lineList.en: I will make thy name to be remembered in all generations: therefore shall the people praise thee for ever and ever.
lineList.cn: 我必叫你的名被万代记念。所以万民要永永远远称谢你。
